desc: Consumes an enemy or neutral creep, acquiring any special abilities that it possessed.
notes:
Gives Doom the original bounty of the creep, along with the bonus gold.
The amount of time it takes to Devour depends on the current HP of the unit.
Doom can't Devour mechanical or ancient units.
If you devour a creep without abilities, you'll keep the abilities you had previously.
cmb:
60
70/60/50/40
lore: Lucifer's appetite and greed are never sated.
name: doom_bringer_devour

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Carpets the nearby earth in flames, damaging enemies while Doom gains bonus HP regen and increased movement speed.
notes:
Scorched Earth follows Doom, centered on his location.
Other units Doom controls also benefit from Scorched Earth.
cmb:
60/65/70/75
60/55/50/45
lore: The Fallen One spreads destruction in his wake, sparing none from the flame which sustains him.
name: doom_bringer_scorched_earth

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Ignites an enemy hero's soul, dealing base damage and a mini-stun. If the target hero's level is a multiple of the Hero Level Multiplier, or they are level 25, they will be dealt additional damage equal to 20% of their maximum health.
cmb:
110/110/110/110
8
lore: Lucifer shares the fire branding bestowed upon him at the time of his exile.
name: doom_bringer_lvl_death

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Pure
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc:
Inflicts a curse that prevents an enemy Hero from casting spells or using items, while taking damage over time.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes: If a magic shield is present, such as the barrier from Pipe of Insight, Doom will damage the barrier first before moving on to the Hero.
attrib:
DURATION: 15
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 20/35/50
SCEPTER DURATION: 16/16/16
SCEPTER DAMAGE PER SECOND: 40/60/80
cmb:
150/200/250
100
lore: When a name is tolled from the bell of Vashundol, doom is sure to follow.
name: doom_bringer_doom
